DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct United States America ( USA ) . The aim study assess longitudinal variation immune biomarkers subject type 1 diabetes ( T1D ) , type 2 diabetes ( T2D ) healthy , non-diabetic subject one year period .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Biomarker Expression Diabetic Healthy Subjects Over One Year Period
DOC.criteria: T1D Male female subject diagnose within last 3 year good general health base medical history Age equal 14 year equal 40 year Body weight 45 kg T2D Male female subject diagnose within last 15 year good general health base medical history HbA1c 6.5 % 10 % Body mass index ( BMI ) 45 kg/m^2 Age equal 18 65 year On insulin treatment HS Male female subject good general heath base medical history Age equal 18 year equal 40 year Any chronic disorder ( besides T1D T2D ) severe disease , opinion investigator , might jeopardize subject 's safety compliance protocol Female childbearing potential pregnant , breastfeeding , intend become pregnant
